oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Truan family, ca. 1922
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A.F. Truan yard, ca. 1922. Adrian in car ("Franklin," the second family car they owned). L-r:W.D. Truan, Milred Truanm L.C. Truan, dog "Shots," Edgar Truan with pony "Harry."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Families; Automobiles; Dogs; Ponies; Houses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
